value:
His Highness wished...to liberate the
world. He may be gone, but that
yearning for freedom lives on in me.

The hearts of dragons and humans
are so similar, and so easily twisted.
If only we had seen that sooner...

Whether it be relaxing, learning, or
loving, humans are ever inclined to
lose themselves in their pursuits.
I'm...smiling? I'm smiling!

When I see a flower swaying in the
wind, I feel as if I finally understand
what it means to be alive...

I am Idunn... I am on a pilgrimage
of sorts, to see what I can learn
from every corner of the world.

After a thousand suns and a thousand
moons, I still await the shared world
my brethren dreamed of long ago.

Even if you can't change the past,
you can live for the future. Take
heart, and move ever forward.
This must be what sorrow feels like...

This is but the first step. One day,
I will understand the wisdom held
by humans and dragons alike.

I am Idunn... Though I was once in a
slumber for years beyond count, my
life has begun anew.

The dream... It felt like it lasted for
an eternity. All I could do was wait,
trapped utterly alone in a silent void.$k$pI only awoke because His Highness
willed it. A fervent voice, a pair of
hollow eyes, and a mighty sword...$k$pIn that moment, the seal broke,
and my eternity ended.$k$pThe isolation had robbed me of my
heart, leaving nothing but despair in
its wake...just like His Highness.$k$pThe joy of friendship, the hope of
new beginning, and the warmth of
life... I wish he could also feel these.$k$pHis Highness now slumbers in his
own dream, but perhaps he will
get that chance one day.$k$pAnd, when I finally feel truly free,
he will be glad...for we are all
connected by our dreams.
たっ
これで…
ああっ
こんなことが…
My heart…
To protect the world...
I want to help.
No longer alone...
I'm sorry...
Huh...?
I feel as if I've been reborn somehow...
*surprise* You're mysterious.
Fae was so happy to see how I've changed.
Wind, trees, laughter... I know these things now. Thanks to them...
Flowers are very beautiful. I like them.
I wonder if...if a heart has grown inside of me...
When I am with you, I can smile.
Yes.
Go where?
I'm going now.
